      Modify Part.
      Parameters:
      event - Mouse click event handler to modify product.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Loader throws a Runtime Exception if it cannot retrieve the FXML document. The initPart() will also throw a IOException if no part is selected from the table. The error will be caught and a message dialog box will appear.

      Parameters:
      event - Mouse click event handler to modify product.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Loader throws a Runtime Exception if it cannot retrieve the FXML document. The initPart() will also throw a IOException if no product is selected from the table. The error will be caught and a message dialog box will appear.

    • searchPartKeyPressed

      private void searchPartKeyPressed​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      Search Part. I had to check if tempList is null because the function lookupProduct() returns an observable list or null if not products are found. As well, I had to check if the first element in the observable list is null because the .add() function returns a product or null if not found.
      Parameters:
      event - Keyboard Enter event handler to search for product. Once found, the table will populate with found parts. If none is found, it will throw error message.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Loader throws a Runtime Exception if it cannot retrieve the FXML document. The initPart() will also throw a IOException if no product is selected from the table. The error will be caught and a message dialog box will appear.

    • searchProductKeyPressed

      private void searchProductKeyPressed​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      Search Product.
      Parameters:
      keyEvent - Keyboard Enter event handler to search for product. Once found, the table will populate with found parts. If none is found, it will throw error message.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Loader throws a Runtime Exception if it cannot retrieve the FXML document. The initPart() will also throw a IOException if no product is selected from the table. The error will be caught and a message dialog box will appear. I had to check if tempList is null because the function lookupProduct() returns an observable list or null if not products are found. As well, I had to check if the first element in the observable list is null because the .add() function returns a product or null if not found.

    • isNumber

      private boolean isNumber​(java.lang.String isNum)
      Checks to see if all characters in the string are numbers and return a boolean.
      Parameters:
      isNum - String to check whether a string is a whole number.
      Returns:
      Return false is one character is not a number, return true if all characters are numbers.
